title: Cimika
desc:
I built a conversion-focused landing page designed for paid acquisition. Using Google Tag Manager, I configured tags, triggers, and variables to capture key visitor events and analyze them in Google Analytics.

 To boost trust, I added a customer reviews section so prospects see real testimonials. I worked with the SEO team on on-page strategy (dynamic meta, crawlable sections, and structured content) and optimized code and assets to keep page load fast for ad traffic.
highlights: Conversion-oriented landing page tailored for Google Ads traffic.
GTM setup (tags/triggers/variables) feeding into Google Analytics.
Customer reviews/testimonials for stronger social proof.
On-page SEO collaboration with dynamic, crawl-friendly content.
Performance tuning: lean code, optimized assets, and fast page loads.
